pageContext.claim: “The Biden-Sanders agenda is -- agenda is the most extreme platform of any major party nominee, by far, in American history. I think it's worse than, actually, Bernie's platform; it's gone so far right.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump may be mixing up the left and right of the political spectrum here, but Biden’s positions are not on the far end of either. The Democratic Party has moved farther to the left in recent years, but his positions are not more liberal than Sanders’s.
